hook.text: Leg swings, arm circles, walking lunges â€” movement-based stretches prime your body for action.

buildup.text: Dynamic stretching takes joints through full range with controlled movement. No holding required.

discovery.text: It raises muscle temperature, activates the nervous system, and rehearses movement patterns.

twist.text: Unlike static stretching, dynamic stretching improves performance when done before exercise.

climax.text: Match your dynamic warm-up to your workout. Running? Leg swings. Lifting? Bodyweight squats.

punchline.text: Dynamic stretching warms you up and loosens you at the same time.

quiz.question: How does dynamic stretching differ from static stretching before exercise?
options: It improves rather than reduces performance
